name: Microsoft Office Click-To-Run代码执行漏洞
product: ["Microsoft Office 2016", "Microsoft SharePoint Enterprise Server 2016", "Microsoft SharePoint Server 2019", "Microsoft SharePoint Server Subscription Edition", "Microsoft Office Deployment Tool"]
description: Microsoft Office是美国微软（Microsoft）公司的一款办公软件套件产品。该产品常用组件包括Word、Excel、Access、Powerpoint、FrontPage等。Microsoft Office Click-To-Run存在代码执行漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞在系统上执行任意代码。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2026-20943
patch: Microsoft Office Click-To-Run代码执行漏洞的补丁
